body.title: Innovator of the Year
body.Institution: Northvale Institute of Advanced Studies - Crestfall City, Avalora
body.achDescription: Awarded <sup>1<sup>st</sup></sup> place for designing a groundbreaking workflow optimization system adopted by multiple departments across the institute.

body.title: Strategic Leadership Excellence Award
body.Institution: Riverside School of Business & Management - Silverford, Norvalla
body.achDescription: Recognized for leading a student consultancy team that achieved a <sup>20%</sup> operational efficiency increase for a partnered non-profit organization.
